title: Champions compare 3-hit skills.
body:
{{champion:245}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:150}} http://imgur.com/AAS1tB4

{{champion:245}} Alright, you first gnar.

{{champion:150}} SHIBBLES!

http://i.imgur.com/5z43zhz.png

{{champion:150}} WABA!

http://i.imgur.com/RGnrd3J.png

{{champion:150}} LCSBIGPLAYZ!

http://i.imgur.com/Kgkjyo2.png

{{champion:245}} Pfft, piddly damage. Watch this.

http://i.imgur.com/CW2SSmm.png

{{champion:245}} And this.

http://i.imgur.com/8MarfYI.png

{{champion:245}} And THEN...

http://i.imgur.com/vr8If9v.png

{{champion:245}} Friggin' roasted.

{{champion:254}} Nice work junior. Now lemme show you how a lady does work.

http://i.imgur.com/viuaLLr.png

{{champion:254}} and again.

http://i.imgur.com/sDBqFeR.png

{{champion:254}} SUCK IT.

http://i.imgur.com/awEVqnO.png

{{champion:254}} Easy as pie.

{{champion:82}} Hey, what are you guys doing?

{{champion:245}} Comparing three hit abilities. Wanna try?

{{champion:82}} I, uh, I really shouldn't.

{{champion:150}} SPONGEBOB!

{{champion:254}} I think that means give it a try.

{{champion:82}} *Sigh* Alright...

http://i.imgur.com/C5AlLog.png

{{champion:82}} One...

{{champion:245}} Hah, baby damage.

http://i.imgur.com/lWIH1Y6.png

{{champion:82}} Two...

{{champion:150}} SHIGGYWIGGYWARGLEDOUBLELIFT!

http://i.imgur.com/b5rkazN.png

{{champion:82}} Are you guys REALLY sure I should-

{{champion:254}} Don't be a bitch.

http://i.imgur.com/i2WGdtk.png

{{champion:82}} Well, ok. Thre-

http://i.imgur.com/giolMLN.jpg

replies.body:
Came in expecting a thread asking for Vayne nerfs.

Got something better.  Teehee.
Nerf Vayne, thanks.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=74o3ioZh,comment-id=00070003,timestamp=2015-08-24T18:23:45.486+0000)
>
> Nerf Vayne, thanks.

xdxdxd nice may may
Better than vayne nerfs? Impossible.

>

Nothing will ever be better than seeing Vayne get gutted/ nerfed
what about these demons {{champion:105}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:78}}
Learning how to play in bot lane might.
I thought that Rioters did not read these posts about Vayne

> [{quoted}](name=gypsylord,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=74o3ioZh,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-24T17:52:57.541+0000)
>
> Came in expecting a thread asking for Vayne nerfs.
> 
> Got something better.  Teehee.

how is this upvoted? its literally a rioter ignoring the fact that vayne is op >_< lol

You know, considering the number of posts about Vayne being OP, I think they're aware whether or not she gets nerfs anytime soon.

And besides, Morde's burst is numero uno right now. The joke is funny.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=74o3ioZh,comment-id=000700050000,timestamp=2015-08-25T00:41:58.587+0000)
>
> You know, considering the number of posts about Vayne being OP, I think they're aware whether or not she gets nerfs anytime soon.
> 
> And besides, Morde's burst is numero uno right now. The joke is funny.

did i ever say the joke wasn't funny? no i hue'd hard at it but still i'd expect the rage posters to downvote it  it was a legit question though youu could take that wrong but i swear everything i post gets downvoted no matter if my opinion is popular or not

It was mostly context. I think the Red in question was making a joke, and it looked like you were criticizing them.

It happens. I make that mistake more times than I would like to admit ;~; Don't worry about it too much, just learn from your experiences like I do.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=74o3ioZh,comment-id=00070005000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-25T21:04:04.957+0000)
>
> It was mostly context. I think the Red in question was making a joke, and it looked like you were criticizing them.
> 
> It happens. I make that mistake more times than I would like to admit ;~; Don't worry about it too much, just learn from your experiences like I do.

everyonne makes mistakes and learns from them except bronze 5 0 lp players they don't know shit but never the less i am not one of them
Yeah, someone who has no authority in the balance department ignoring a balance assertion that isn't even present on this post.  Until he literally fucking brought it up himself.

> [{quoted}](name=gypsylord,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=74o3ioZh,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-24T17:52:57.541+0000)
>
> Came in expecting a thread asking for Vayne nerfs.
> 
> Got something better.  Teehee.

Lol i was Expecting Vayne there too since she do the same as {{champion:82}}  (for a range champ Really high damage)
vayne nurfs pl0x
even rito thinks they made a mistake with morde

Why hi there, gypsylord. How's it been? Been having a great day? :)

Now, let me start out by asking why you can't tell us any insights on what you or some of the other guys would like to do to Mordekaiser to help him out of this funk he's in? You see, he's kind-of at the bottom of every win-rate, but rising in ADC so don't worry. But, with this, don't you see? You can now talk with us and find ways to bring Mordekaiser back. 

I'd really appreciate it if we could get this going. I promise not to be harsh or rude.

That was actually amazing and hilarious.

Edit: What the fuck is wrong with Gnar? He said "LCSBIGPLAYS", "SPONGEBOB", and "SHIGGYWIGGYWARGLE**DOUBLELIFT**". Makes no sense.
Caveman gibberish. A language lost to time.
The mystery deepens.
Jay Watford.

Gnar speech reminds me off this.
http://41.media.tumblr.com/6b31a18e73ffd576a52a4c3991168dd6/tumblr_ml9j4qAGfF1rkorg2o1_500.jpg
What is that and why don't I have it?
Skyrim
Yes, I'm aware it's Skyrim, I was looking for the mod name.
Supposedly an easter egg from a Skyrim mod "Beyond Reach".
Scarecrow Ghost!!
{{item:3070}} {{champion:9}} {{item:3070}}
Yeah, this seems just about right. The explosion seems a bit small though.
can you add{{champion:67}}

Vayne's is just damage. 

The ones already listed all give more than just damage, and the one that does get only damage gets exponential damage. 

Vayne's Silver Bolts isn't as big a deal as people make it out to be. Her Final Hour steroid is scarier than her Silver Bolts.
They said they were comparing abilities. It doesn't matter whether or not it does damage or not.
could you do {{champion:1}}?
anyone else notice the 4th to last pic of Morde is backwards?
Isnt thst Vi's e?
Yes, but the point was to make it look like vi was hitting it.
Why is Ekko using a Dildo though?
I have an idea. Why not make a visual effect for Morde when he kills something with 3rd Q, there would appear a mini nuclear explosion? Because you know, it's a nuke...

So true. I once took a level 9 Thresh down at half health with my third Q strike, coupled with Titanic Hydra's active.

It was glorious.
Is Vel'Koz not in this because it's actually a 12 hit combo?
upvote for Ms paint skillz
Heheh, pretty true if you don't get kited to death by the enemy
I lol'd at Gnar's third battle cry.

That explosion is actually the shockwave from the impact hitting so hard that it travels back in time and chops {{champion:68}}'s Old Meatball Q and R in half into its more awesome version that it is today.
Must be nice to attack an immobile dummy so you can land the three hits.
